archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Algorithmic Product Offering Pricing Matrix Definition
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define the product offering pricing matrix and its association(s) to the specific product offering(s) to which it applies.

properties.value: Develop Algorithmic Product Offering Pricing Matrix Definition defines the product offering pricing matrix based on a matrix specification and its association(s) to the specific product offering(s) to which it applies.
